name: Erlanger Health System
notes: 6 hospitals; academic affiliate of UT Health Science Center; 10 residency and 15 fellowship programs with 207 trainees; Level I Trauma Center

name: Cone Health
notes: 5 hospitals; flagship Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital is a 628-bed teaching hospital; ACGME-accredited residencies in internal medicine, family medicine, and other specialties

name: WakeMed Health & Hospitals
notes: 5 hospitals (3 acute care plus rehab and behavioral health); GME programs in partnership with regional medical schools; 501(c)(3) nonprofit
